name: The Root of the Route
description:
Created for the Global Game Jam 2023 (Theme: Roots), "The Root of the Route" is a prison break game with the core mechanic of being able to swap characters in a chain from the player. In doing so the player can use these connections that root out to help free the root character from prison.

Created By: Austin Dwyer, Cameron Smith, Matt Tryhuk, and Tiernan Kingzett
